movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The story of a man with a low IQ who achieves great things in his life.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A meek Hobbit sets out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: The Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop a powerful threat from destroying the planet.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: Peter Parker's secret identity is exposed, leading to chaos and unforeseen challenges.

movies.title: The Godfather Part II
movies.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young FBI agent must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to catch another serial killer.

movies.title: Se7en
movies.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.description: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with a mysterious woman to escape from a tyrant.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: The story of the founders of the social-networking website, Facebook.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.description: In Nazi-occupied France, a group of Jewish soldiers plan to assassinate Nazi leaders.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between a wealthy family and a destitute clan.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: In Gotham's fractured society, a mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.description: Eight years after the Joker's reign of chaos, the Dark Knight must return to protect Gotham City.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and more are experienced through the eyes of Forrest Gump.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.description: William Wallace leads the Scots in a rebellion against the English.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress meet and fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

movies.title: The Godfather Part II
movies.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed, while his son expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

movies.title: Coco
movies.description: Despite his family's generations-old ban on music, young Miguel dreams of becoming an accomplished musician.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

movies.title: Up
movies.description: Seventy-eight-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

movies.title: Inside Out
movies.description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust, and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city.

movies.title: The Revenant
movies.description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: The story of how Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg created Facebook, became a billionaire, and was sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.description: Eight years after the Joker's defeat, Batman comes out of retirement when a mysterious terrorist known as Bane emerges.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer.
